#summary How-To

= How-Tos =

== Getting started ==
  # Install [http://www.eclipse.org/windowbuilder/download.php Window Builder] within eclipse
  # Install postgres
  # create a database called `openreg` 
  # Set the correct test-database connection url inside `resources/dbconfig.txt`
  # Remove `swt-4.2.1-win32-win32-x86_64.jar` from your buildpath and add from `lib/` the corresponding swt library
